articles.description: Yesterday, 250 Googlers announced that they’ve taken the plunge and formed a union, and, after a torrent of news coverage, they ended the day over 400-strong. The effort is unique in that it’s aimed at uniting all workers, from maintenance to full-time develo…

articles.author: Danielle Wiener-Bronner, CNN Business
articles.title: McDonald's adds three new sandwiches to compete in chicken wars - CNN
articles.description: McDonald's is launching new sandwiches next month in an effort to win fast food's chicken war.

articles.author: Paul R. La Monica, CNN Business
articles.title: Jeff Bezos, Jamie Dimon and Warren Buffett tried to solve health care. 3 years later, their company has shut down - CNN
articles.description: Haven, an ambitious health care company formed just three years ago as a partnership between Amazon, Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway and JPMorgan Chase, is shutting down.
articles.content:
